oai_dc:dc.dc:title: James K. Polk
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: James K. Polk (1795-1849), 11th President of the United States, seated with left arm resting on a desk and a book in his right hand. His signature is located at the bottom.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Original painting created by Alonzo Chappel.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Presidents
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
